project_abstract.cdata: The project will assist the local authorities in Southern Jiangsu to strengthen their environmental planning and management capabilities, and to carry out priority initiatives in the regional environmental strategy and action plans in an efficient and effective manner.  The main project components will comprise:  (a) a line of credit for large-scale industrial pollution control subprojects in the urban areas of Suzhou, Wuzi, Changzhou and Zhenjiang; small-scale industrial pollution control subprojects and pilot township and village industrial enterprise environmental management subprojects in Greater Suzhou and Wuzi; (b) construction of municipal facilities for urban wastewater management in Wuxi, Changzhou and Zhenjiang; (c) establishment of solid and hazardous waste management registration centers (in Jiangsu and Wuxi) and a hazardous material emergency response center in Wuxi, and construction of a hazardous material storage and transshipment facilities in Wuxi; and (d) technical assistance and training for the provincial and municipal environmental protection bureaus, municipal sewerage companies, hazardous material storage company and the industrial subproject financial agent (China Investment Bank, Jiangsu Branch).

P003580.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>苏南环保项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将协助苏南地方政府加强其环境规划和管理能力，高效及有效实施区域环境战略和行动计划中的重点项目。项目的主要内容包括：（1）提供转贷款，用于苏州、无锡、常州和镇江城区大型工业污染控制子项目建设，苏州和无锡地区小型工业污染控制子项目及乡镇工业企业环境管理子项目建设；（2）在无锡、常州和镇江建设市政污水管理设施；（3）组建（江苏省和无锡市）固体及有害废物管理登记中心和无锡市有害物应急响应中心，在无锡建设有害物储存和转运设施；（4）向省级和市级环保局、市政污水公司、有害物储存公司和工业子项目金融中介（中国投资银行江苏省分行）提供技术援助和培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
